title: Come home with love....
posting_body: ['The Quinn', '5500 Mountain Vista Street, Las Vegas, NV, 89120', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'WELCOME TO THE QUINN APARTMENT HOMES', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 790 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to The Quinn Apartments.', 'Experience quiet and distinctive apartment homes for rent situated within the Paradise Valley, minutes away from the world famous Las Vegas Strip.', 'Comfort and relaxation set the theme for The Quinn Apartments.', "Our lush landscaping and unique architecture provide an atmosphere you won't find anywhere else.", 'Visit our photo gallery and call us to schedule a personal tour.', 'Open the door to a new way of life at The Quinn Apartments.', 'Features', '- Hardwood-Inspired Flooring*', '- Two-Toned Upgraded Paint*', '- Stainless-Steel Appliances*', '- In-Kitchen Pantry', '- Newly Renovated Apartment Homes Available*', '- Walk-In Closets', '- Double Kitchen Sinks', '- Fireplace*', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Patio/Balcony', '- Central Air Conditioning & Heating', '- Full-Size Washer/Dryer', '*In select apartment homes only', 'Community Amenities', '- 24-Hour Pool & Spa', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '- Online Payments Available', '- Fitness Center', '- Free Wi-Fi in Common Areas', '- Community Clubhouse', '- Gated Entry', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday 9:00', 'AM-6:00 PM', 'Saturday 10:00 AM-5:00 PM', 'Sunday 10:00 PM-5:00 PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We are a pet friendly community.', 'Please see one of our leasing specialists for a list of pet deposit, pet fees and monthly pet rent information.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Weight limitations apply.', 'Income Requirements:', '3-times the monthly rent amount.', 'NB3x3QHMRtT']
